title: Katowice
summary: Katowice (UK: /ˌkætəˈviːtsə/ KAT-ə-VEET-sə,[3] US: /ˌkɑːt-/ KAHT-,[4] Polish: [katɔˈvitsɛ] (listen); German: Kattowitz)[lower-alpha 1] is the capital city of the Silesian Voivodeship in south-west Poland, and the central city of the Upper Silesian metropolitan area. It is the 11th-most populous city in Poland, while its urban area is the  most populous in the country and one of the most populous in the EU.
